mapper.sql: an.anime_id an.total_episodes, an.current_episode, an.name, an.start_date, an.end_date, an.rating
FROM anime an JOIN tags ta ON an.anime_id = ta.anime_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anime (total_episodes, current_episode, name, start_date, end_date, rating) VALUES (#{anime.totalEpisodes}, #{anime.currentEpisode}, #{anime.name}, #{anime.startDate}, #{anime.endDate}, #{anime.rating})
mapper.update: UPDATE anime an SET an.name = #{anime.name}, an.total_episodes = #{anime.totalEpsiodes}, an.current_episode = #{anime.currentEpisode}, an.start_date = #{anime.startDate}, an.end_date = #{anime.endDate}, an.rating = #{anime.rating} WHERE an.anime_id = #{anime.animeId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM anime an WHERE an.anime_id = #{animeId}
